text: Francisco Ibáñez de Segovia y Peralta Francisco Ibáñez de Segovia y Peralta (1644–1712) was a Spanish colonial administrator who was Royal Governor of Chile from 1700 to 1709. He was born in Madrid and died in Lima. ==Sources== * * * Category:1644 births Category:1712 deaths Category:Military personnel from Madrid Category:Royal Governors of Chile Category:Spanish generals Category:Spanish military personnel
title: Francisco Ibáñez de Peralta
